actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the true location of a portion of the northerly boundary of the Angeles National Forest in Los Angeles County, California on the common line between section 16 and 17, township 4 N., range 10 W., San Bernardino meridian, and to establish the center quarter of said section 16.

summary.text: Establishes the true location of a portion of the northerly boundary of the Angeles National Forest in Los Angeles County, California.

titles.title: A bill to establish the true location of a portion of the northerly boundary of the Angeles National Forest in Los Angeles County, California on the common line between section 16 and 17, township 4 N., range 10 W., San Bernardino meridian, and to establish the center quarter of said section 16.
